Cooks' D outlier observations

####Description 

Identify outliers in cook's d plot.

####Usage 
<pre><code>
ols_prep_outlier_obs(k)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 
  
* `k` : Cooks' d bar plot data.

####Examples 

```{r} 
model <- lm(mpg ~ disp + hp + wt, data = mtcars)
k <- ols_prep_cdplot_data(model)
ols_prep_outlier_obs(k)
```
